review: I purchased this so I could use Amazon Music in my living room. My bluray player didn't offer that app. Does everything it says it will do. Easy set up. easy to navigate.The only thing that would have made it better for my situation would be a power off switch. I connected it through a HDMI switcher. The switcher automatically detects which device is on. Without a power off on the remote, the HDMI switch wont work automatically. To remedy the situation for me I connected the Fire TV to a HDMI input on the TV and connected my bluray player and cable box to the switcher. They have off switches. I would recommend this device to my friends.
